thread.title: W.H. chief digital officer among 6 staffers booted last week
thread.title_full: W.H. chief digital officer among 6 staffers booted last week

author: ELIZABETH ELIZALDE
title: W.H. chief digital officer among 6 staffers booted last week
text:
White House chief digital officer among 6 staffers booted last week over FBI background checks: report W.H. chief digital officer among 6 staffers booted last week NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  36 PM 
White House Chief Digital Officer Gerrit Lansing was among the six staffers booted from the White House last week after failing to pass an FBI background check, according to a report. 
Sources told Politico that Lansing’s dismissal was over investments. 
Before joining the Trump administration, Lansing led the Republican National Committee’s digital department since 2015. 
The six employees were escorted out of the White House because they failed to pass the SF86 questionnaire, which is used for security clearances. White House Chief Digital Officer Gerrit Lansing was among the six staffers booted from the White House last week. (Tom Williams/CQ-Roll Call,Inc.) 
Caroline Wiles, President Trump’s director of scheduling, was also among those staffers who didn't pass the background check. 
She resigned Friday and will reportedly work at the Treasury Department instead, sources told Politico . 
In Lansing’s case, sources said he left on Feb. 9 after sorting out the issue. The White House did not immediately respond to a Daily News request for comment. (Pool/Getty Images) 
House scraps Social Security gun background check rule 
The dismissals came the week President Trump fired ex –national security adviser, Michael Flynn , and former Labor Secretary nominee, fast food CEO Andrew Puzder, withdrew his name from consideration. 
More recently, ex-CIA analyst, Edward Price, resigned from the agency because of Trump’s “ disturbing ” actions in office. Tags:
